reviewText: Although many network marketing companies no longer offer a retail opportunity - for those companies that do - this cassette set is a must-own for MLM distributors, as you definitely will recruit with retailing.  Learn the techniques of success with this complete package.

Great information.
The workbook spell it all out for you and your team in how easy it is to follow and make sales.
Just read and follow the directions if you want to make money.
Buy using this you can now duplicate yourself and let your team see how to go about it.
It like you are the actor and you just read the script. Then you get paid.
The course will pay for itself. Thanks Dale for putting this together.
